snippet.title: Monster Sanctuary | Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Become a Monster Keeper in Monster Sanctuary - a monster-collecting, strategic Metroidvania on PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PlayStation®4. As the latest heir in a long line of Monster Keepers, players must explore and traverse a rich variety of environments and stop the growing and mysterious threat to the harmonious peace between monsters and humanity itself!

OUT NOW! 

Official website: 
Follow DEVELOPER on Twitter: https://twitter.com/moi_rai_
Follow Team17 on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Team17Ltd
Like Team17 on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Team17/


About Team17 Digital Ltd
Founded in 1990, Team17 Digital Limited is a leading international games label that hosts the Worms franchise, Blasphemous, The Escapists, Moving Out, Overcooked, Neon Abyss, Going Under, Yooka-Laylee and many more from developers around the world. 

Visit www.team17.com for more info.
